com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
public class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext
extends Object
implements ICryptoContext

This key exchange crypto context provides an implementation of the JSON web encryption algorithm as defined in JSON Web Encryption. It supports a limited subset of the algorithms.

Nested Class Summary
static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.AesKwCryptoContext
          AES key wrap encrypt/decrypt of the content encryption key.
private static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.Algorithm
          Supported content encryption key encryption algorithms.
static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.CekCryptoContext
          The Content Encryption Key crypto context is used to encrypt/decrypt the randomly generated content encryption key.
static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.Encryption
          Supported plaintext encryption algorithms.
static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.Format
          Support serialization formats.
static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.RsaOaepCryptoContext
          RSA-OAEP encrypt/decrypt of the content encryption key.

Constructor Detail

JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext

public JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext(MslContext ctx,
                                      JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.CekCryptoContext cryptoContext,
                                      JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.Encryption enc,
                                      JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.Format format)
Create a new JSON web encryption crypto context with the provided content encryption key crypto context and specified plaintext encryption algorithm.

Parameters:
ctx - MSL context.
cryptoContext - content encryption key crypto context.
enc - plaintext encryption algorithm.
format - serialization format.

verify

public boolean verify(byte[] data,
                      byte[] signature)
               throws MslCryptoException
Description copied from interface: ICryptoContext
Verifies the signature for some data. The signature may not be a signature proper, but the name suits the concept.

Specified by:
verify in interface ICryptoContext
Parameters:
data - the data.
signature - the signature.
Returns:
true if the data is verified, false if validation fails.
Throws:
MslCryptoException - if there is an error verifying the signature.
